name: Supreme Carnivore
description: A hearty mix of pepperoni, sausage, olives, mushrooms and melted mozzarella.

name: Classic Margherita
description: Fresh tomato sauce, melted mozzarella and micro greens for a light, refreshing taste.

name: Smokey Chicken Ranch
description: Tender smoked chicken, ranch drizzle, herbs and peppers on a creamy mozzarella base.

name: Cheese Overload
description: A rich blend of melted cheeses with oregano and basil for pure cheesy perfection.

name: Mediterranean Feast
description: Sausage, mushrooms, olives, peppers and mozzarella inspired by bold Mediterranean flavors.

name: Garden Fresh Burrata
description: Burrata cheese, cherry tomatoes and basil on a wood-fired crust.
